name: @waddlesplash
body: Old-school hacker. GUI addict. Clean coder. Tolerates Linux. Loves [Haiku](https://haiku-os.org). Prefers JavaScript over C++ over Python. [Tweeter](http://twitter.com/waddlesplash). [Redditor](https://www.reddit.com/user/waddlesplash). Freenoder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
